Name: Professor Hewel
Text: You must defeat Banktanias forces. In order to do so, you must command our troops.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Select a unit by bringing the cursor overtop of our BLUE troops. Select them with Z on the keyboard or left click.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Once they are selected you will see where they can move to. Select a spot within the blue tiles to move it to that location.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Once it moves, you can select a command such as wait, or attack if an enemy is beside the unit.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: If you ever need to stop an order, press X on the keyboard or right click the menu! Don't worry, you'll be leading like a natural in no time!
